metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19608 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Arm Mbed TLS before 2.14.1, before 2.7.8, and before 2.1.17 allows a local unprivileged attacker to recover the plaintext of RSA decryption, which is used in RSA-without-(EC)DH(E) cipher suites.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto3 - 2.16.4-1ubuntu2
libmbedtls12 - 2.16.4-1ubuntu2
libmbedx509-0 - 2.16.4-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.4-1ubuntu2').
